SimPlugins/src/TrackFilterMessenger.cxx
00001 #include "SimPlugins/TrackFilterMessenger.h"
00002 
00003 #include "SimPlugins/TrackFilterPlugin.h"
00004 #include "SimCore/TrackFilter.h"
00005 
00006 namespace ldmx {
00007 
00008     TrackFilterMessenger::TrackFilterMessenger(TrackFilterPlugin* plugin)
00009             : UserActionPluginMessenger(plugin), plugin_(plugin) {
00010 
00011         thresholdCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithADoubleAndUnit(std::string(getPath() + "threshold").c_str(), this);
00012         thresholdCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on minimum KE at track vertex");
00013         thresholdCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00014 
00015         pdgCodeCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAnInteger(std::string(getPath() + "pdgid").c_str(), this);
00016         pdgCodeCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on PDG ID code");
00017         pdgCodeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00018 
00019         particleCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString(std::string(getPath() + "particle").c_str(), this);
00020         particleCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on the name of a particle");
00021         particleCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00022         G4UIparameter* particle = new G4UIparameter("particleName", 's', false);
00023         particle->SetGuidance("Name of particle");
00024         particleCmd_->SetParameter(particle);
00025 
00026         processCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "process").c_str(), this);
00027         processCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on creator physics process name");
00028         processCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00029         G4UIparameter* processName = new G4UIparameter("processName", 's', false);
00030         processName->SetGuidance("Name of Geant4 physics process to save");
00031         processCmd_->SetParameter(processName);
00032         G4UIparameter* exactMatch = new G4UIparameter("exactMatch", 'b', true);
00033         exactMatch->SetGuidance("True if process name match should be exact");
00034         processCmd_->SetParameter(exactMatch);
00035 
00036         parentCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "parent").c_str(), this);
00037         parentCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on creator physics process of daughter tracks");
00038         parentCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00039         processName = new G4UIparameter("processName", 's', false);
00040         processName->SetGuidance("Name of Geant4 physics process to save");
00041         parentCmd_->SetParameter(processName);
00042         exactMatch = new G4UIparameter("exactMatch", 'b', true);
00043         exactMatch->SetGuidance("True if process name match should be exact");
00044         parentCmd_->SetParameter(exactMatch);
00045 
00046         regionCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "region").c_str(), this);
00047         regionCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on name of detector region");
00048         regionCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00049         G4UIparameter* regionName = new G4UIparameter("regionName", 's', false);
00050         regionName->SetGuidance("Name of region");
00051         regionCmd_->SetParameter(regionName);
00052         G4UIparameter* regionSave = new G4UIparameter("save", 'b', true);
00053         regionSave->SetGuidance("True to save tracks in the region or false to not save");
00054         regionCmd_->SetParameter(regionSave);
00055 
00056         volumeCmd_ = new G4UIcommand(std::string(getPath() + "volume").c_str(), this);
00057         volumeCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on name of logical volume at track vertex");
00058         volumeCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00059         G4UIparameter* volumeName = new G4UIparameter("volumeName", 's', false);
00060         volumeName->SetGuidance("Name of volume");
00061         volumeCmd_->SetParameter(volumeName);
00062         G4UIparameter* volumeSave = new G4UIparameter("save", 'b', true);
00063         volumeSave->SetGuidance("True to save tracks in the volume or false to not save");
00064         volumeCmd_->SetParameter(volumeSave);
00065 
00066         trackIDCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAnInteger(std::string(getPath() + "trackid").c_str(), this);
00067         trackIDCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter on track ID");
00068         trackIDCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00069 
00070         passCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithoutParameter(std::string(getPath() + "pass").c_str(), this);
00071         passCmd_->SetGuidance("Filter that always passes");
00072         passCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00073 
00074         createCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString(std::string(getPath() + "create").c_str(), this);
00075         createCmd_->SetGuidance("Create a filter chain from the current set of filters");
00076         createCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00077 
00078         printCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString(std::string(getPath() + "print").c_str(), this);
00079         printCmd_->SetGuidance("Print out filter chain information");
00080         printCmd_->GetParameter(0)->SetGuidance("Name of the filter chain to print out");
00081         printCmd_->GetParameter(0)->SetOmittable(true);
00082         createCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00083 
00084         actionCmd_ = new G4UIcmdWithAString(std::string(getPath() + "action").c_str(), this);
00085         actionCmd_->SetGuidance("Set the tracking action ('pre' or 'post')");
00086         actionCmd_->AvailableForStates(G4ApplicationState::G4State_Idle);
00087     }
00088 
00089     void TrackFilterMessenger::SetNewValue(G4UIcommand *cmd, G4String newValue) {
00090 
00091         UserActionPluginMessenger::SetNewValue(cmd, newValue);
00092 
00093         if (cmd == thresholdCmd_) {
00094             double threshold = thresholdCmd_->GetNewDoubleValue(newValue);
00095             filters_.push_back(new TrackEnergyFilter(threshold));
00096         } else if (cmd == pdgCodeCmd_) {
00097             int pdgid = pdgCodeCmd_->GetNewIntValue(newValue);
00098             TrackPDGCodeFilter* pdgFilter = getFilter<TrackPDGCodeFilter>();
00099             pdgFilter->addPDGCode(pdgid);
00100         } else if (cmd == processCmd_ || cmd == parentCmd_) {
00101             std::stringstream ss(newValue);
00102             std::string processName;
00103             bool exactMatch = false;
00104             ss >> processName;
00105             if (!ss.eof()) {
00106                 std::string exactMatchStr;
00107                 ss >> exactMatchStr;
00108                 exactMatch = G4UIcommand::ConvertToBool(exactMatchStr.c_str());
00109             }
00110             if (cmd == processCmd_) {
00111                 TrackProcessFilter* processFilter = getFilter<TrackProcessFilter>();
00112                 processFilter->addProcess(processName, exactMatch);
00113             } else if (cmd == parentCmd_) {
00114                 TrackParentProcessFilter* parentFilter = getFilter<TrackParentProcessFilter>();
00115                 parentFilter->addProcess(processName, exactMatch);
00116             }
00117         } else if (cmd == regionCmd_) {
00118             TrackRegionFilter* regionFilter = getFilter<TrackRegionFilter>();
00119             std::stringstream ss(newValue);
00120             std::string regionName;
00121             bool regionSave = true;
00122             ss >> regionName;
00123             if (!ss.eof()) {
00124                 std::string regionSaveStr;
00125                 ss >> regionSaveStr;
00126                 regionSave = G4UIcommand::ConvertToBool(regionSaveStr.c_str());
00127             }
00128             regionFilter->addRegion(regionName, regionSave);
00129         } else if (cmd == volumeCmd_) {
00130             TrackVolumeFilter* volumeFilter = getFilter<TrackVolumeFilter>();
00131             std::stringstream ss(newValue);
00132             std::string volumeName;
00133             bool volumeSave = true;
00134             ss >> volumeName;
00135             if (!ss.eof()) {
00136                 std::string volumeSaveStr;
00137                 ss >> volumeSaveStr;
00138                 volumeSave = G4UIcommand::ConvertToBool(volumeSaveStr.c_str());
00139             }
00140             volumeFilter->addVolume(volumeName, volumeSave);
00141         } else if (cmd == particleCmd_) {
00142             getFilter<TrackPDGCodeFilter>()->addParticle(newValue);
00143         } else if (cmd == actionCmd_) {
00144             std::string newAction(newValue);
00145             std::transform(newAction.begin(), newAction.end(), newAction.begin(), ::tolower);
00146             if (newAction != "pre" && newAction != "post") {
00147                 G4Exception("", "", JustWarning, std::string("Unknown tracking action: " + newValue).c_str());
00148             } else {
00149                 action_ = newAction;
00150             }
00151         } else if (cmd == trackIDCmd_) {
00152             int trackID = trackIDCmd_->GetNewIntValue(newValue);
00153             getFilter<TrackIDFilter>()->addTrackID(trackID);
00154         } else if (cmd == passCmd_) {
00155             filters_.push_back(new TrackPassFilter);
00156         } else if (cmd == createCmd_) {
00157             TrackFilterChain* filterChain = new TrackFilterChain(newValue);
00158             for (auto filter : filters_) {
00159                 filterChain->addFilter(filter);
00160             }
00161             if (action_ == "pre") {
00162                 plugin_->addPreFilterChain(filterChain);
00163             } else {
00164                 plugin_->addPostFilterChain(filterChain);
00165             }
00166             filters_.clear();
00167         } else if (cmd == printCmd_) {
00168             if (newValue.size()) {
00169                 TrackFilterChain* filterChain = plugin_->getFilterChain(newValue);
00170                 if (filterChain) {
00171                     plugin_->print(std::cout, filterChain);
00172                 }
00173             } else {
00174                 plugin_->print(std::cout);
00175             }
00176         }
00177     }
00178 }
